positive_examples: This is an example of ceramic powder.
The ceramic powder demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed ceramic powder in this context.
A typical case of ceramic powder would involve these features.
The concept of ceramic powder applies here.
Finely ground ceramic materials used in the production of pottery, tiles, and advanced ceramics.
negative_examples: This is an example of fallout, not ceramic powder.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Fallout, or other types of Powder

definition: Finely ground inorganic non-metallic material used in ceramic manufacturing.
